trans-unit.source: Serves as the root container for state machine workflows.
trans-unit.target: Funciona como o contêiner raiz para fluxos de trabalho da máquina de estado.

trans-unit.source: Contains event-driven activities and states.
trans-unit.target: Contém as atividades e os estados orientados ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> is an activity container used to create workflows that follow a state machine model.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> é um contêiner de atividades usado para criar fluxos de trabalho que seguem um modelo de máquina de estado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, which means the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> é um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, que significa que o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> pode conter outras atividades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> and the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities are the only permitted child activities of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> e <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> atividades são os únicos permitidos atividades filhas o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities are permitted because the root activity itself behaves like a state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> atividades são permitidas porque a atividade raiz em si se comporta como um estado.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you can have <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities at the root level that are used by all the State activities in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, você pode ter <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> atividades no nível raiz que são usadas por todas as atividades no estado de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities at this level provide a global mechanism for processing workflow events and automate state transitions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> as atividades neste nível fornecem um mecanismo global para o processamento de eventos de fluxo de trabalho e automatizam as transições de estado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> activities provide a mechanism to define the various stages in the model.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> atividades fornecem um mecanismo para definir vários estágios no modelo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> has properties that are required for the execution of the state machine workflow.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> tem propriedades que são necessárias para a execução do fluxo de trabalho de máquina de estado.

trans-unit.source: Most notably, the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> has two properties that are important: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty>.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> tem duas propriedades que são importantes: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty> e <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty> of the state machine is the state in which the state machine is when an instance of the state machine is created.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty> da máquina de estado é o estado em que a máquina de estado quando uma instância da máquina de estado é criado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty> property is mandatory and must be provided when a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> is created.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty> propriedade é obrigatória e deve ser fornecida quando um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> é criado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty> of the state machine is like any other state activity that is contained within the state machine.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty> da máquina de estado é como qualquer outra atividade de estado que está contida dentro da máquina de estado.

trans-unit.source: The state activity can be a direct child of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> root activity and a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> can have only one <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>.
trans-unit.target: A atividade de estado pode ser um filho direto do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> atividade de raiz e um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> só pode ter um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateNameProperty>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty> of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> is a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> activity that is designated as the end state of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty> do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> é um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> atividade que é designada como o estado final do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.

trans-unit.source: When a transition is made to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty>, the workflow execution is completed.
trans-unit.target: Quando é feita uma transição para o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty>, a execução de fluxo de trabalho é concluída.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty> is not mandatory.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateNameProperty> não é obrigatório.

trans-unit.source: This means that you can have a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> that is not completed.
trans-unit.target: Isso significa que você pode ter um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> que não seja concluída.

trans-unit.source: This does not mean that the state machine workflow is always active in memory.
trans-unit.target: Isso não significa que o fluxo de trabalho de máquina de estado é sempre ativo na memória.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> might be unloaded as it waits for an event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> podem ser descarregado, pois ele espera por um evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> activities that never complete are especially useful in processing long running business transactions, as in the case of a purchase order received by a supplier.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> atividades que nunca concluir são especialmente úteis no processamento de transações comerciais, como no caso de uma ordem de compra recebida por um fornecedor de longa execução.

trans-unit.source: The fact that the purchase order was fulfilled does not mean that the purchase order process is over.
trans-unit.target: O fato de que a ordem de compra foi atendida não significa que o processo de ordem de compra está acima.

trans-unit.source: The goods that are part of the purchase order might be returned or the purchase order might be amended and have additional items added to it after the fulfillment.
trans-unit.target: Os produtos que fazem parte da ordem de compra podem ser retornados ou a ordem de compra pode ser corrigida e itens adicionais adicionados a ela após o preenchimento.

trans-unit.source: Sometimes there might be a requirement to keep the purchase order records for an extended period of time for legal or other purposes.
trans-unit.target: Às vezes, pode ser um requisito para manter os registros de ordem de compra por um longo período de tempo para fins legais ou outros.

trans-unit.source: The fact that a workflow does not finish just means that the workflow remains in an unloaded state.
trans-unit.target: O fato de que um fluxo de trabalho não concluído significa apenas que o fluxo de trabalho permanece no estado descarregado.

trans-unit.source: There may be a case for retiring the workflows, which means that after a set period of time the workflow instance may be forced to shut down.
trans-unit.target: Pode haver um caso para desativar os fluxos de trabalho, o que significa que após um período de tempo definido a instância de fluxo de trabalho pode ser forçada a desligar.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> class and use it to implement a basic state machine to transition between three states.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como criar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> classe e usá-lo para implementar uma máquina de estado básica para fazer a transição entre três estados.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK sample from the StateMachineWorkflow.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do exemplo do arquivo StateMachineWorkflow.cs SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Simple State Machine](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [simples máquina de estado](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: O nome da atividade definido pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" /> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" /> usando o nome da atividade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the end <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> de extremidade do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The end <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Final <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: When a transition is made to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateName%2A>, the workflow execution is completed.
trans-unit.target: Quando é feita uma transição para o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateName%2A>, a execução de fluxo de trabalho é concluída.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateName%2A> is not mandatory.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateName%2A> não é obrigatório.

trans-unit.source: This means that you can have a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> that is not completed.
trans-unit.target: Isso significa que você pode ter um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> que não seja concluída.

trans-unit.source: This does not mean that the state machine workflow is always active in memory.
trans-unit.target: Isso não significa que o fluxo de trabalho de máquina de estado é sempre ativo na memória.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> might be unloaded as it waits for an event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> podem ser descarregado, pois ele espera por um evento.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateName%2A>, see <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName%2A> e <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateName%2A>, consulte <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to set the value of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como definir o valor de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateName%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK sample from the StateMachineWorkflow.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do exemplo do arquivo StateMachineWorkflow.cs SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Simple State Machine](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [simples máquina de estado](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e).

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> that targets the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateName" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> que tem como destino a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateName" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the currently executing <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> em execução no momento.

trans-unit.source: The name of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome do atual <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CurrentStateName%2A> property only returns the name of the current state when accessed from within the workflow, for example, from a code handler in a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CurrentStateName%2A> propriedade só retorna o nome do estado atual quando acessado a partir do fluxo de trabalho, por exemplo, um manipulador de código em um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> atividade.

trans-unit.source: The property does not work from host code because the host only has access to a copy of the workflow definition, and never to the live instance tree.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade não funciona no código do host porque o host só tem acesso a uma cópia da definição de fluxo de trabalho e nunca à árvore de instância dinâmica.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] how to determine the current state from the host, see the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.CurrentStateName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance> class.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] como determinar o estado atual do host, consulte o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.CurrentStateName%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" /> that determines whether dynamic updates can be made in the workflow, when overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" /> que determina se as atualizações dinâmicas podem ser feitas no fluxo de trabalho, quando substituído em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" /> that identifies when dynamic updates can be made.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" /> que identifica quando podem ser feitas atualizações dinâmicas.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the `DynamicUpdateCondition` property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como definir o `DynamicUpdateCondition` propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Ordering State Machine SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é do exemplo de ordenação SDK da máquina de estado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ordering State Machine Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59272cf4-bc98-439c-bcfa-b66999ebce5c).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [exemplo pedido de máquina de estado](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59272cf4-bc98-439c-bcfa-b66999ebce5c).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> in which the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" /> is when an instance of the state machine is created.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> no qual o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" /> está quando uma instância da máquina de estado é criada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> in which the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" /> is when an instance of the state machine is created.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> no qual o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" /> é quando uma instância da máquina de estado é criada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName%2A> property is mandatory and must be provided when a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> is created.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName%2A> propriedade é obrigatória e deve ser fornecida quando um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> é criado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName%2A> of the state machine is like any other state activity that is contained within the state machine.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName%2A> da máquina de estado é como qualquer outra atividade de estado que está contida dentro da máquina de estado.

trans-unit.source: The state activity can be a direct child of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> root activity and a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> can have only one <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A atividade de estado pode ser um filho direto do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> atividade de raiz e um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> só pode ter um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName%2A>.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateName%2A>, see <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName%2A> e <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.CompletedStateName%2A>, consulte <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to set the value of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como definir o valor de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK sample from the StateMachineWorkflow.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do exemplo do arquivo StateMachineWorkflow.cs SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Simple State Machine](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [simples máquina de estado](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e).

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> that targets the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject" /> que tem como destino a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.InitialStateName" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the previously executed <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> executado anteriormente.

trans-unit.source: The name of the previous <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome do anterior <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.PreviousStateName%2A> property only returns the name of the previous state when accessed from within the workflow, for example, from a code handler in a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity.PreviousStateName%2A> propriedade só retorna o nome do estado anterior quando acessado a partir do fluxo de trabalho, por exemplo, um manipulador de código em um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>.

trans-unit.source: The property does not work from host code because the host only has access to a copy of the workflow definition, never to the live instance tree.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade não funciona no código do host porque o host só tem acesso a uma cópia da definição de fluxo de trabalho, nunca a árvore de instância dinâmica.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] how to determine the previous state from the host, see the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateHistory%2A> property of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance> class.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] como determinar o estado anterior do host, consulte o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance.StateHistory%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowInstance> classe.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> that is used to change the state of a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> usado para alterar o estado de um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: Este campo é constante.
